4347376.headline: Realty Income Q4 Adjusted FFO Per Share $0.84
4347376.description: Feb 22 (Reuters) - Realty Income Corp <O.N>::Q4 ADJUSTED FFO PER SHARE $0.84 .REALTY INCOME ANNOUNCES OPERATING RESULTS FOR FOURTH QUARTER AND 2020.QTRLY NET INCOME PER SHARE WAS $0.33.COLLECTED 93.6% OF CONTRACTUAL RENT IN QUARTER.Q4 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $0.34 -- REFINITIV IBES DATA.

4380793.headline: Realty Income To Merge With Vereit In All-Stock Transaction
4380793.description: April 29 (Reuters) - Realty Income Corp <O.N>::PRESS RELEASE - REALTY INCOME TO MERGE WITH VEREIT® IN ALL-STOCK TRANSACTION.REALTY INCOME CORP - DEAL FOR ENTERPRISE VALUE OF APPROXIMATELY $50 BILLION.REALTY INCOME CORP - ALL-STOCK TRANSACTION EXPECTED TO GENERATE 10%+ ACCRETION TO ANNUALIZED AFFO PER SHARE.REALTY INCOME CORP - EXPECT TO SPIN-OFF ASSETS IN DEDICATED PORTFOLIO OF OFFICE PROPERTIES.REALTY INCOME - UNDER DEAL TERMS, VEREIT SHAREHOLDERS WILL RECEIVE 0.705 SHARES OF REALTY INCOME STOCK FOR EVERY SHARE OF VEREIT STOCK THEY OWN.REALTY INCOME - EXPECT TO EFFECTUATE A TAXABLE SPIN-OFF OF SUBSTANTIALLY ALL OF OFFICE PROPERTIES OF BOTH COS INTO A PUBLICLY TRADED REIT ("SPINCO").REALTY INCOME CORP - REALTY INCOME WILL CONTINUE TO BE LED BY PRESIDENT AND CHIEF EXECUTIVE OFFICER SUMIT ROY.REALTY INCOME CORP - UPON CLOSING, TWO VEREIT DIRECTORS WILL BE APPOINTED TO REALTY INCOME BOARD.REALTY INCOME - ON RUN-RATE BASIS, TO ACHIEVE ESTIMATED ANNUALIZED CORPORATE COST SYNERGIES OF $45 - $55 MILLION INCLUSIVE OF STOCK-BASED COMPENSATION.REALTY INCOME CORP - FOLLOWING MERGER AND SPIN-OFF, REALTY INCOME WILL CONTINUE AS SURVIVING PUBLIC ENTITY.REALTY INCOME - WILL ACQUIRE VEREIT IN AN ALL-STOCK TRANSACTION, CREATING A COMBINED COMPANY WITH AN ENTERPRISE VALUE OF APPROXIMATELY $50 BILLION.REALTY INCOME CORP - CO, VEREIT SHAREHOLDERS EXPECTED TO OWN ABOUT 70% AND 30%, RESPECTIVELY, OF BOTH REALTY INCOME AND SPINCO .

4617085.headline: Realty Income Announces Results For Three Months Ended Sept 30
4617085.description: Nov 2 (Reuters) - Realty Income Corp <O.N>::REALTY INCOME ANNOUNCES OPERATING RESULTS FOR THE THREE AND NINE MONTHS ENDED SEPTEMBER 30, 2022.QTRLY NET INCOME AVAILABLE TO COMMON STOCKHOLDERS WAS $219.6 MILLION, OR $0.36 PER SHARE.QTRLY NORMALIZED FFO PER SHARE INCREASED 9.0% TO $0.97.QTRLY  TOTAL REVENUE OF $837.3 MILLION VERSUS $489.9 MILLION.Q3 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $0.33, REVENUE VIEW $823.7 MILLION -- REFINITIV IBES DATA.
